messages.message: @Dominic Fannjiang could you share the flow/input that's triggering this error? does this reproduce consistently or does it happen sporadically?
Yes, attached is the input file + workflow file , and see attached for the services im running
got it, thanks for the info â€” will try to repro and report back!
oh also, i forgot to mention - I'm checked out to the 21.4.0 release branch
@Dominic Fannjiang any reason you need to use 21.4?

I was trying to debug this bofA issue https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/INSIGHTS-3038 where an error occurs on 21.10.0 but not on 21.4.0, so I was trying to reproduce the working refiner on 21.4.0.

Actually we just found the fix for 21.10.0 discussed here https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0119EXLXGU/p1646977675950049, so this is alot less urgent now.
I see the problem is resolved in another thread. Do you still have the issue running a flow @Dominic Fannjiang?

I do but since a fix to the actual observed problem in refiner was found, I don't need to investigate further. I wasn't running into this issue when running the flow in 21.10.0 on my local so maybe we can investigate this another time if it comes up
